rules.title: No glitching, hacking, or other types of cheating.
Be respectful of all players (no toxicity, trolling, hate speech, etc).
No real-life threats, doxing, or other type of malicious behavior.
No griefing - this includes intentionally blocking off bases or building players in.
No building to troll named locations. This including walling off access to public areas of interest (eg. sulfer quarry).
No Self Promoting
rules.description: Streamers are welcome to play on our servers. But spamming chat with promotions and/or advertising will not be promoted any form. If you wish to promote on our servers please contact our administration on our discord.
